title: Bad Childhood, Good Life Week: I’m Dredging Up My Childhood Trauma
description:
Betsy continues to go back to her childhood trauma from 30 years ago that she allows to manifest daily. - Dr. Laura: "Don't bother rehashing childhood misery unless it is really an impediment to your life today!"

Are you stuck on rehashing the past? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

Order Dr. Laura's book: “Bad Childhood, Good Life”

go to > https://www.drlaura.com/dr-laura-book-bad-childhood-good-life

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
